issue.title: [CI] Decommission "C++ with clang 7 and system packages" Travis CI job
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6787](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6787). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that this is running in GitHub Actions, we can probably skip it in Travis CI?

Any other barriers to turning this off and saving the CI build time?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6787?focusedCommentId=16946051) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5592
